lines.text: When your God tells you to beat the shit out of somebody, you do it. That's what religion is all about!
Get real, mum, I'm not marrying someone with bigger its than me. He looks like a condom full of walnuts.

[Looks at Testiculi after having made love with him]
Was it as good for you as it was for me?

[Considers]
Well... I didn't expect the earth to move... but I at least expected you to.

[Gushes]
Your so romantic...
[Sucking, kissing noises as they snog]
What would I want with a beautiful young thing when I've got you, eh?
"Cluck, cluck, cluck; Ah, *uck this for a joke".

[to Ursys]
I'll fight you on one condition... that you lower your nipples.

[bursts into song]
Tie a yellow ribbon round the old oak tree...

[Shocked]
What is that man doing with his hand on my Labia!

[picks up saddle but can't lift it as its too heavy]
Fuck...
[tries again]
Bloody hell...
[tries again then feels his hair]
Hang on a sec... my hair feels shorter! Awww, Del!

[to Hercules]
Well I suppose I better introduce you to me mum.

[On seeing Labia & Hercules approach]
Darling, you haven't been hanging around the gymnasium again have you?
Mum, who do you think is the dumbest man in the world?
Why Hercules of course!
Well say hello!

[Hercules starts walking away]
Oi, oi! I'm talking to you, you rude bugger!

[Watches Fanny walk away]
Is there something you want to tell me?
What? About Fanny? We're just good friends...
She's wearing your underpants.

[Avoids her eyes and starts picking at food]
Well, we're obviously very good friends ain't we...
[Trails off]

[to Labia and Testiculi]
I only have sex if someone puts me up to it!

[Purple smoke rises from a potion]
Whoops, that Ribena's getting a bit hot.
You couldn't organize a fart at a curry-eating contest!
What have you got against her? I think your just jealous cause her mum's bar's doing better than your beer garden.
No, it's not that. It's because, well, I love you son. Now come here f*ck knuckle. You see, years ago, me and her mum, well, we sort of had this thing...
Are you telling me you could be her father?
Nah, not at all. I'm just bragging.
Watch the next punch after this one, it won't even connect! See!
You promised me you wouldn't fight anymore after that man was killed.

[as Zeus]
Your actual purpose is not as you believe to marry Labia, but to reveal your true homosexuality.

[confused]
Homosexual?

[strokes her husbands hair]
Ooh, your dandruffs getting worse, innit?
Fuck off!

[walks away]
Fair enough.
I know this might be an in opportune moment, but what about the bill?
OOOOOOh, bill?
[getting angry]
You mean you want me to pay for all this?

[Apologetically]
Forget i said anything, forget it!
I thought you were doing this because you liked me!
Mmmm. Black undies!
Oh, those f*ckin' prawns.
